name: friend-guard

effect.black-white: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle. This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.
effect.black-2-white-2: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle. This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.

short_effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
